message: Let's split it 60/40, my dear Bob. Fair enough?
I'll give you a small share, but I think this is the best I can do. Take it or leave it!
How about we both get half? It's fair, isn't it?
You're trying to get half, but I'll give you even less. You should be grateful!
I think a 45/55 split would be reasonable. What do you think, Bob?
I'm getting desperate, but I'll give you a tiny share. Don't expect more!
